cu.explanation_en: Setting the global log level to an invalid value 'invalid' will cause logging configuration errors and prevent proper log output.

du.explanation_en: Setting the PUSCH antenna ports to an out-of-range value of 16 will cause antenna configuration errors and prevent uplink transmission.
du.explanation_zh: 將 PUSCH 天線埠設定為超出範圍的值 16，會導致天線配置錯誤，並阻止上行鏈路傳輸。
